products.facts: ["Made with 72% cocoa content, providing a rich and intense chocolate flavor.","Contains whole almonds, adding a crunchy texture and healthy fats.","Sourced from sustainable cocoa farms, promoting ecological balance and fair trade practices.","Free from artificial additives, ensuring a high-quality, pure chocolate experience."]

products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, en:corn-flakes
products.facts: ["Corn Flakes are primarily made from milled corn, sugar, and malt flavoring.","The production of Corn Flakes often involves the use of sustainable farming practices to minimize ecological impact.","Corn Flakes are fortified with vitamins and minerals, enhancing their nutritional quality.","The packaging of Corn Flakes is designed to be recyclable, supporting environmental sustainability efforts."]

products.name: Classic Potato Chips
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Snacks, Cereals and potatoes, Salty snacks, Appetizers, Chips and fries, Crisps, Potato crisps
products.labels: No gluten, No artificial flavors, No preservatives
products.facts: ["Classic Potato Chips are primarily made from potatoes, vegetable oil, and salt.","The production of potato chips can have a significant environmental impact due to water usage and agricultural practices.","Quality potato chips are typically made from whole potatoes, ensuring a fresh taste and texture.","Many brands are now exploring eco-friendly packaging options to reduce plastic waste associated with snack foods."]

products.facts: ["Made from whole grain oats that are minimally processed for maximum nutrition.","Oats are a sustainable crop that requires less water and fertilizer compared to many other grains.","Rich in dietary fiber, particularly beta-glucan, which supports heart health and digestion.","Non-GMO and often certified organic, ensuring high quality and safety standards."]

products.facts: ["Made from organic peanuts with no added preservatives or artificial ingredients.","Produced using sustainable farming practices that promote biodiversity and soil health.","Contains healthy fats, protein, and essential nutrients, contributing to a balanced diet.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact."]

products.name: Purified Drinking Water
products.facts: ["Purified drinking water is typically packaged in BPA-free plastic bottles to ensure safety and reduce chemical leaching.","The purification process often involves filtration, reverse osmosis, and UV treatment to remove contaminants and improve taste.","Many brands of purified drinking water use recycled materials for their bottles, contributing to reduced plastic waste in the environment.","Purified drinking water is tested regularly for quality, ensuring it meets or exceeds safety standards set by health authorities."]

products.name: Purified Water
products.ingredients_text: PURIFIED WATER, CALCIUM CHLORIDE, SODIUM BICARBONATE.
products.facts: ["Purified water is typically sourced from municipal supplies or natural springs and undergoes filtration and purification processes to remove contaminants.","The packaging for purified water, often made from PET plastic, is recyclable, helping to reduce environmental impact when properly disposed of.","Purified water has a low mineral content, making it ideal for hydration without added substances, and is often tested for quality standards set by health authorities.","Many brands of purified water use eco-friendly practices, such as using renewable energy in production and sourcing water sustainably."]
